text:
Wow that sounds like you have adapted well over there. We are under Circuit Breaker in Singapore till 1 June to try bring down the cases to single digit.

Many businesses are affected, govt is giving salary support (wage credits 75% this month for all business sectors), businesses with the greatest impact get more support (additional duration), for us, we are thankful that we are in the digital space.

We have been going live on Facebook 2 times week to share about social media insights. So far we talked about Facebook and Instagram mostly.

Also talked about which social media platform one should choose.
The webinars are recorded as the event has passed, it happened on 28 & 29 April.. but more will be coming. We hope to do more in the coming weeks!
Would like to be notified about webinars

answers.text: @weston_hotel hi thanks for your interest, our webinars will be up on YouTube on 7 May for property agents and the Insurance Agent webinar will be up by mid May. I see you are from Kenya! How’s things there?

@skydigitalagency We are grateful for the opportunity to re-orient our business with new emerging needs shaped by the pandemic. We are optimistic it will strengthen our outlook. How is the financial hub in Singapore holding up ?
